short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change screen edge color by URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension colors the edge of the page when a specific URL is opened.

For instance, you can specify different colors for production and staging environments. This feature assists in preventing operational errors.
